I was born in Freeport on the continant of Antonica some time ago.

I have little memory of my parents. I was very young when they were murdered over taxes by a guard named Lucan. It was at this time that the goddess Erollisi Mar found me. After that I decided to become a good-hearted person, and to love, and respect others. I wandered around till I was about 7-9 years of age in the common lands selling silk and killing orcs when I met a small female named Herbdiva. Shortly after I made the acquaintance of Ursi, and, as you can see I am currently a member of the Fellowship. Herbdiva taught me many things and I am a better person because of it. I still don't like to swim very much, but I do owe her credit for my stellar doggy paddle technique. I currently am in the midst of finding my parent's killer Lucan, and I have found leads that he lives in the very city I was born in. I fight everyday not to loose control and act upon my revenge, but I wonder if I will ever get back what he took from me.

To bury my aggressive feelings, I fight in groups, help my fellow guild mates, and complete quests. As life continues its array of ironic circumstances, I find myself back in Freeport to complete a quest. However this quest pins me against Lucan for what is known as the Brilliant Sword of Faith. It tears me apart inside to know that such a vile, corrupt man could ever wield such a marvel to this world. This sword is no mere piece of steel, when combined with the proper hilt, and my Testimony of Truth, it will emit a constant flame that will burn for all eternity. I know that when Erollisi Mar came to me in my youth, that she would not ever abandon me. She must have known that in time I would be strong enough to return to Lucan and exact my revenge. For she must feel, as I do, that the Soulfire blade is the very embodiment of the burning in my heart from all those years ago.

Once it is mine, and Lucan is dead, my healing will finally begin. I look forward to the days when I can truly be a child of light.
